data.text: @xCeleste___ @BTS_twt I really don't like Niki Minaj's music, so I was a bit sceptic when I heard the rumor about her being on the titletrack. But releasing a digital track with her like they did with Mic Drop was a good decision. Plus the version with her isn't that bad. I still prefer the original.
@xCeleste___ @BTS_twt From the moment I found out that Nicki would collab with BTS I was hyped😏 And that song is lit af so....😍😍😍
@xCeleste___ @BTS_twt I really wanna see a shot of yoongi and nicki rapping together, I’m so excited
@lilu_munieka @xCeleste___ @BTS_twt That’s what I am worried about. And Nicki is always active on Twitter
@martyandy23 @xCeleste___ @BTS_twt I hope ARMYs won't do like what they did with Wale and alienating collaborators against BTS 😒
@xCeleste___ @BangtanSeaDayak @BTS_twt Those are fakeu fans! Glad that they can leave,, just respect the boys decision,,
@xCeleste___ @BTS_twt We just bonded with Niki fans during streaming party... don't f up our friendship
@xCeleste___ @BTS_twt This is probably why BTS doesn’t do a lot of collaborations. I think it’s awesome that they are trying to push the boundaries of kpop.
@xCeleste___ @BTS_twt They’re really going to collab ???
@xCeleste___ @BTS_twt I don't usually listen to Nicki but i believe in our boys's choice so
@xCeleste___ @BTS_twt yes! you my friend are an intellectual that needs to speak louder for the un educated people in the back.
@xCeleste___ @BTS_twt 1 hour to go before the comeback but some are flooding hates and negativity already. sigh
@xCeleste___ @BTS_twt Plus! The boys were the ones that asked, and she happily accepted so I'm happy for them 💜🙌💜
@xCeleste___ @BTS_twt Is this what they mean by “controversial”????!!!! I like it. Weed out the “fake army” with their “Fake Love”
@xCeleste___ @BTS_twt Guys just stop with the negativity...This is going to be ICONIC!😨💜
@xCeleste___ @BTS_twt ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ I don't like her, but they can do whatever they want.

@xCeleste___ @BTS_twt You know well  @BTS_twt  said that they would rather like 'negative comments' than 'no comments'
So stay positive and keep going...Ulsoo👍👍👍💜

@xCeleste___ @BTS_twt Didn’t ppl say that Army will be tested this comeback. Look at them already. Ready to flake. Plus Nicki ain’t that bad. She shady and speaks up mind and stands up for her music. It may not be as polished as some ppl want it but it’s her right.

@xCeleste___ @BTS_twt Idk why all the negativity. I mean they chose her because she fits in what they want to do. I don't really listen to her but i am so hyped. I will support this collab because it will be iconic. True ARMYS would trust our boys. They know what they are doing.
@xCeleste___ @BTS_twt Exactly they are grown & they can choose whoever they want to collab with👏🏼
@xCeleste___ @BTS_twt Exactly what I am saying https://t.co/XjS1qvsin8
@xCeleste___ @BTS_twt True. Ugh I mean what's with all the hate? We all know Nicki is a queen who spits bars.
@xCeleste___ @BTS_twt 👍👍👍💜
